name: elixir-supervisor
description: Production Supervisor with configurable restart strategies
template:
defmodule {{module_name}} do
  use Supervisor

  @moduledoc """
  Supervisor for {{description}}.
  
  Manages child processes with {{strategy}} restart strategy.
  Children are started in order and restarted according to the strategy.
  """

  def start_link(init_arg) do
    Supervisor.start_link(__MODULE__, init_arg, name: __MODULE__)
  end

  @impl true
  def init(_init_arg) do
    children = [
      # Static children
      {{child_specs}}
    ]

    Supervisor.init(children, strategy: :{{strategy}})
  end

  @doc """
  Starts a dynamic child under this supervisor.
  """
  def start_child(child_spec) do
    Supervisor.start_child(__MODULE__, child_spec)
  end

  @doc """
  Terminates a child process.
  """
  def terminate_child(child_id) do
    Supervisor.terminate_child(__MODULE__, child_id)
  end

  @doc """
  Returns count of active children.
  """
  def count_children do
    Supervisor.count_children(__MODULE__)
  end
end

strategies.one_for_one: If a child process terminates, only that process is restarted
strategies.one_for_all: If a child process terminates, all other child processes are terminated and then all are restarted
strategies.rest_for_one: If a child process terminates, the rest of the children started after it are terminated and restarted
